website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for an inexpensive wipe for a sensitive bottom this is a good bet.
pros: Plastic opening on the bag helps keep wipes wet
Contains vitamin E. A strong wipe
A thicker wipe than Pampers so you don't have to "feel" the mess
cons: Sometimes these wipes don't come wet enough

customer_reviews.title: Pull-out hole on top is too small.
customer_reviews.text: Great wipes. I have used them for years on an incontinent adult, but this particular packaging has a hole on top that is too small, making it difficult to pull the next wipe off. It can get frustrating. Somehow, the same wipes sold at Walmart are in a package with a larger hole on top, and the pulling of one wipe brings the edge of the next one out, like it supposed to happen. It beats me why the same product comes in two different packagings.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Favorite wipes
customer_reviews.text: These are my absolute favorites wipes for anything from wiping a behind to wiping dirty hands after playing at the park. Although I rarely have little ones in my car with me, I use these often for myself. I tend to hike and kayak - these help me feel clean afterward. They're also good for clean-up after the occasional glazed donut!
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Bulk costs less
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad these don't have a strong scent. Buying 5 packs at once is a better deal. I have an old plastic box that wipes were sold in during the 1980's. I put these in it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Amazing brand!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a present for a baby shower and they were a huge hit!
customer_reviews.author: Princess Saige

customer_reviews.title: Good wipes
customer_reviews.text: My husband tried these wipes at his job and fell in love with them because the thickness and size.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann

customer_reviews.title: Best price
customer_reviews.text: This was the best price for these diapers. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: BKNJ17

customer_reviews.title: Dried out
customer_reviews.text: Unhappy with this purchase. We have bought this product before and liked them, however these were dried out and the packaging was dusty. Not worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: Kassy

customer_reviews.title: like buying these
customer_reviews.text: took forever to get delivered but finally got it 👍 good product
customer_reviews.author: Dz

customer_reviews.title: Yasss
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes, just needs more fluids and it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jing

customer_reviews.title: Great, but too easy to be torn
customer_reviews.text: The wipes are great. I also like the separate packaging. One Major issue is that it is too easily torn (and annoying) when I applied it to my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: We use regularly. Great value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable. Great value for money. We have been using them regularly for months. They aren't the absolutely softest wipes in the world but they get the job done and my son doesn't seem to mind them. Love that they are fragrance free for his sensitive bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine B

product_meta.title: Parent's Choice Fragrance Free Baby Wipes, 500 count (5 packs of 100)
product_meta.description:
Durable and Soft Material

This braided elastic is made of polyester and Natural Latex Rubber, durable and soft, with strong elasticity and flexibility. Comfortable enough and will not hurt your skin. A good choice for sewing and knitting.
Good Elasticity

The braided elastic with good quality is very stretchy, and in the range of allowable tensile elastic deformation, can easily restore the original length without deformation.
Wide Usage

The braided elastic with good elasticity can be applied widely for wigs, underwear, pants, sportswear, skirts, waistbands, necklines or crafts DIY projects, which bring convenience and joy of DIY to your life. (You can use this elastic to make crib sheets and sew covers for you bog's or cat's bed)
Specification:

- Material: polyester and Natural Latex Rubber
- Size: 200-yards*1/8in(1 roll)
- Color: white
Note:

1. Since the yarn thickness of each batch is slightly different, the width will be a 1mm discrepancy.
2. Due to the different viewing angles of the light, the color may have little difference.
